src:
Prazne puške na Keramici
Valjadolid pregazio Majorku - 3:0

03 Nov 2019

Mreže na Keramici ostale su netaknute. Viljareal i Atletik Bilbao je trebalo da igraju jedan od zanimljivijih mečeva 12. kola, ali na kraju je 90 minuta igre prošlo bez nekih većih uzbuđenja – 0:0.
Kada se sve sabere, možda je Viljareal bio malo bolji tim, ali nije uspeo da iskoristi nijednu situaciju pred golom rivala. Poslednja je bila u 91. minutu, ali je Ekambi izblokiran. Slađi deo kolača odneo je Bilbao, koji ostaja na samo jednoj pobedi u šest poslednjih kola.
Valjadolid je odigrao najbolju utakmicu u sezoni. Majorka se držala 40 minuta, a onda je u narednih deset dva puta kapitulirala – 3:0.
Iznenađujuće je dobar Valjadolid ove sezone, drži se u sredini tabele, a od pet poslednjih utakmica izgubio je samo jednu i to od Barselone. Naspram njega, Majorka je u krizi, nije upisala trijumf u tri vezane utakmice.
Foto: Reuters

text:
Empty rifles on Ceramics
Valladolid overtook Mallorca - 3-0

03 Nov 2019

The ceramic networks remained intact. Villarreal and Athletic Bilbao should have played one of the more interesting matches of round 12, but in the end 90 minutes of the game went without some great excitement - 0: 0.
When it all came together, Villarreal might have been a slightly better team, but it failed to take advantage of any situation in front of a rival's goal. The last was in the 91st minute, but Ekambi was unblocked. The sweetest part of the cake was taken by Bilbao, who remains on just one win in the last six rounds.
Valladolid played its best game of the season. Majorca held on for 40 minutes, then capitulated twice in the next ten - 3-0.
He is surprisingly good at Valladolid this season, keeping in the middle of the table, and he has lost only one out of Barcelona in his last five games. Against him, Majorca is in turmoil, failing to record triumph in three tied games.
Photo by Reuters
